code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Table,Button,Form}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function WarehouseList(){const[warehouses,setWarehouses]=useState([]);const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',location:''});useEffect(()=>{fetchWarehouses();},[]);const fetchWarehouses=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5001/api/warehouses');setWarehouses(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('http://localhost:5001/api/warehouses',form);setForm({name:'',location:''});fetchWarehouses();}catch(err){console.error(err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Warehouses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"Warehouse Name",value:form.name,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,name:e.target.value}),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form.Group,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Label,{children:"Location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"text",placeholder:"Location",value:form.location,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,location:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",type:"submit",children:"Add Warehouse"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{striped:true,bordered:true,hover:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Location"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:warehouses.map(warehouse=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:warehouse.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:warehouse.location})]},warehouse.id))})]})]});}export default WarehouseList;
